name: Aldus Krickler
summary: A higher member of Eliza gang, Gutter Blades .
info: Was responsible to handle the shipment of Deamleaf, in a deal that was paid by Dieter von Liebwitz. Was however sold out by Mercy Lowhaven gang, directly by Ferro Fugglefiddle that killed all in the operation but him, who was offered as a price to Stefan Hoffman .

name: Alex
summary: A hedge wizard that is in league with Cordelia Wesselingh

name: Allrella
summary: A cultist of Slaanesh, killed by Gustav Rechtshandler
info: Was a cultist of Saalnesh, trying to blackmail Gustav. There togheter with Elphoise and Hugo

name: Andreas Von Bruner
summary: Cousin of Boniel Von Bruner and Gutele Von Bruner
info: here is a good lin @Cordelia Wesselingh

name: Boniel Von Bruner
summary: Cousin of Andreas Von Bruner and brother to Gutele Von Bruner
info: They are curious and suspicious on Andreas goings

name: Borgun Foambeard
summary: Brewmaster
info: Brother of Dwargun Foambeard and Borgun Foambeard, his uncle is Galvic Boarhand
title: Brewmaster

name: Christoph Engel
summary: A Grey Wizard. Has a odd tower in Ubersreik, where you can only enter to a special entrance in Cordelia Wesselingh apothecary
title: Wizard

name: Cordelia Wesselingh
summary: Apotechary with a friendship with Alex the hedge wizard. Also has the secret entrance to Christoph Engel tower in her house.

name: Dannel Meer
summary: Master Thief, planning a heist on Black Rock itself
title: Thief

name: Diego
summary: Vallentino Florentino man in Ubersreik
info: Was to ensure the weapons came to Vallentino Florentino by dealing with Wilmer

name: Dordean Mounflair
info: @Diego

name: Dwargun Foambeard
info: Brother of Borgun Foambeard

name: Elena Kurtz
summary: A healer and a herbalist.
info:
In the service of Cordelia Wesselingh, and hope to learn and earn her upkeep in order to go back to her home village to care for the people there. 
Came to Ubersreik with the players

name: Eliza Rauch
summary:
Leader of the Gutter Blades. 
A secret cultist of Slaanesh, and partake in ritual pain, which is appearant by many scars
info:
Has hired the players to steal the load from Wilmer. Thinking it was the drugs that Mercy Lowhaven stole from her earlier, when Aldus Krickler was put behind bars. 
However, it turns out it was weapon that Guido Falck had managed to source to be sent to Vallentino Florentino. Something she doesn't know about. 
She introduces them to Lucius Tarn and then pays them to deliver a note to move Aldus Krickler to another cell, to break him out. 
She wants to steal a painting from Andreas Von Bruner, that is tied to Slaanesh. This as a part of her ongoing struggle Gregor Pierson, the current cult leader of The Eldritch Order of the Unblinking Eye.

name: Elphoise
summary: Killed by the Players in Three Feathers, on behalf of Gustav Rechtshandler. Was a cultist of Saalnesh, trying to blackmail Gustav. There togheter with Allrella and Hugo
info: Killed by the Players in Three Feathers, on behalf of Gustav Rechtshandler. Was a cultist of Saalnesh, trying to blackmail Gustav. There togheter with Allrella and Hugo

name: Emanuelle Nacht
summary: De facto ruler of Ubersreik
info:
On the lead of the Purple hands involvment near the Emperor, not knowing who exactlyi was doing what, but tried to investigate. Was sent  as the ruler of Ubersreik, and finds it to far from Altdorf. She suspects something is off. 
Thinks General Jendrick Von Dabernick is a oaf

name: Ernst Geldfinger
summary: Head of the customs house in Ubersreik

name: Ernst Maller
summary: Burgomeister of Ubersreik
info: After the fall of Jugenfreund, he is a de facto ruler of Ubersreik, by leading the town council. Strives to make Ubersreik a free city, to not have an noble ruler again.

name: Fagor
summary: @Diego
title: Enter title...

name: Franz Lohner
summary: Innkeeper and owner of the Red Moon Inn

name: Friedrich Ferr
summary: A excessive gambler and a member of the Cult of Ranald
info:
Often spend his time at the Crooked Hammer and well known by Gert Hunder. 
Is part of the Cult of Ranald, and tries to find new potential members to it for Ilse Frecht
title: Gambler

name: Galvic Boarhand
summary: Drunken uncle to Borgun Foambeard

name: General Jendrick Von Dabernick
summary: Ruler of Ubersreik,
info:
Responsible for leading the armies hat sized control of Ubersreik, on the Emperors order. Heavy handed in his pursuit of any one opposing his rule in the town.  
Works with Emanuelle Nacht, but doesn't like her that much. Thinks she interfers to much which his rule

name: Gerhart Urteil
summary: Magistrate in Ubersriek
info: One of the judges in the dispute between Eberhart Von Dammenblatz and Maria Ulrike Von Liebwitz Of Ambosstein, visual guide as well for Hanna Anwalt

name: Guido Falck
summary: Rebel leader, former captain of the guard for Jugenfreund, and still loyal to them. Fights against the Altdorfs
info: Had arranged the weaponshipment that Wilmer  was supposed to get out to Vallentino Florentino.
title: Rebel leader

name: Gutele Von Bruner
summary: Sister to Boniel Von Bruner and cousin of Andreas Von Bruner

name: Hanna Anwalt
summary: Magistrate in Ubersreik. More or less blind since an accident when she was young.
info: One of the judges in the case between Eberhart Von Dammenblatz and Maria Ulrike Von Liebwitz Of Ambosstein. Is guided by Gerhart Urteil

name: Heinrich Böttcher
info: Champion of Eberhart Von Dammenblatz
title: Judicial Champion

name: Hugo
summary: Killed by the Players in Three Feathers, on behalf of Gustav Rechtshandler. Was a cultist of Saalnesh, trying to blackmail Gustav. There togheter with Elphoise  and Hugo
info: Killed by the Players in Three Feathers, on behalf of Gustav Rechtshandler. Was a cultist of Saalnesh, trying to blackmail Gustav. There togheter with Elphoise  and Hugo

name: Klaus Rauchfeldt
summary: Inspector working for

name: Lucius Tarn
summary: Properotier of the Gloaming Chamber
info:
Lucius Tarn is a man of refinement and control, always seen in meticulously tailored robes of deep burgundy and gold, with subtle motifs of serpents winding through the fabric. He rules the Gloaming Chamber and is in a very tight business relationship with Eliza Rauch. He his however not yet a Slaaneshi cultist, but he knows Eliza is. He has yet to take the plunge, and is currently just enabling it and try to keep control of the situation. 
A common guest at his place is Andreas Von Bruner. Gregor Pierson is aware of Lucius position, and is slowly trying to get him over to the cult

name: Maria Ulrike Von Liebwitz Of Ambosstein
Mercy Lowhaven
summary: Leader of the Lowhaven gang of criminal halflings

name: Nils
summary: Dock inspector

name: Eberhart Von Dammenblatz
info: Accuses Maria Ulrike Von Liebwitz Of Ambosstein of murdering his father, Otto von Dammenblatz. His mother is Violetta Von Dammenblatz

name: Violetta Von Dammenblatz
summary: Late wife of Otto von Dammenblatz, mother of Eberhart Von Dammenblatz

name: Wilhelm Big Willi Docker
summary: Guild master of the Stevadors. A huge man with a union type mindset
title: Guild master

name: Wilmer
summary: Small time smuggler, with a nose an oppertunity
info: After the fall of the Jugenfreuds struggled a bit to get his footing again. Manged to get in contact with Guido Falck, and agreed to ship weapons to Vallentino Florentino. Stored them at Thomas Prahmhandler warehouse, but didn't dear ship them out as he knew Klaus Rauchfeldt somehow had gotten a lead on him. Contacted Gert Hunder to get hold of some fresh faces to handl the shipment, the Players. Set it all up and went out to Vallentino Florentino to meet up the shipment. As it never came he got really nervous, and will return back to the city to find out what happened. Will meet up again with Diego and try to backtrack what happened. Thomas Prahmhandler will be super mad for the fuck up, and Wilmer will try go get hold of the players.

name: Albrecht Baumann
summary: Head Coachman at von Bruners. Called the Old Bear

name: Albrecht Baumann
description: The heads coachman for a noble house. Gruff old man under the name Old Bear

name: Albrecht Baumann
description: The heads coachman for a noble house. Gruff old man under the name Old Bear

name: Anna Rugger
description: An old woman, running a boarding house in poor side of town. A no nonsense woman, with sharp eyes&amp;amp;nbsp;

name: Mikhail Ziegel
description: A very charming middle aged man, a charlatan dressed up as a noble

name: Dieter von Liebwitz
description: A young noble man, well groomed beard, yellow and purple livre
summary: Cousin of Maria Ulrike Von Liebwitz Of Ambosstein. Know for his party lifestyle in Nuln.
info: Made a deal with Eliza Rauch, where he was to get a large shipment of dreamleaf. But when Ferro Fugglefiddle and the Lowhaven clan hit the deal, he panicked and got Gustav Rechtshandler involved to ensure Aldus Krickler, Elizas man, was handled as he could make the connection to Dieter.
title: Noble lord

name: Ferro Fugglefiddle
description: A harden halfling thug, curly hair, big nose, and sly smile
summary: A thug in the Lowhaven clan. Low on morale and very loyal to the clan.
info: Was responsible to get Aldus Krickler in prision, by hijacking the dream leaf shipment he was responsible to handle.

name: Stefan Hoffman
description: A corrupt captain of the guard, stubby beard and smoking a pipe&nbsp;
summary: A corrupt former captain of the guard. Have been taking money from Mercy Lowhaven, but has been demoted after the Jugenfreud outing. .
info: Had a deal with Mercy Lowhaven where she gave him info on Eliza Rauch drugdeal handled by Aldus Krickler. After Ferro Fugglefiddle disposed Aldus man, Stefan moved in and arrested Aldus. However, after the Altdorf takeover, he was soon out of a job and is quite bitter about it. Doing small favours for Mercy now

name: Pjotor Dovic
description: A street gang leader, teenager, Slavic, rough appearance and hard eyes.
summary: A young man that is one of Eliza Rauch low level officer in the gang. Originally from Kislev, he has been in Ubersreik for some time
info: A low level officer of the Gutter Blades. Will be responsible for the break out of Aldus Krickler

name: Pelle
info: test

name: Bruno Franke
summary: Was the champion of Maria Ulrike Von Liebwitz Of Ambosstein, but killed by

name: Dominique Herveaux
summary: Assasin hired by Eberhart Von Dammenblatz to kill Bruno Franke, which she did. Tried to kill Francois Beauharnais  as well, but killed by the players before they could confirm her connections to Eberhart

name: Curls
summary: Thug in the employ of Thomas Prahmhandler
info: Friend of Aldus Krickler

name: Thomas Prahmhandler
summary:
Merchant with flexible morale that has an import / export business in Ubersreik. 
Betroth to Hanna Lastkhan
info:
Has a business in Ubersreiks, quite successful. Knows that some of the goods going through his warehose is probably not totally legal, he doesnt care that much as long as he gets his pay. 
Had a problematic relationship with his future wife Hanna Lastkhan, who he found out has an afair with Friedrich von Pfeifraucher. He went to the Three Feathers in to mess him up, but never managed to. 

Wilmer had stored the weapon at Thomas, as they had done business before. Was not aware of the content, but after Nils was knocked out by the Players in his warehouse as Klaus Rauchfeldt was doing a search, he is fuming mad at Wilmer that drew attention to him. 

Got a descriptions of the players, and realize who they are. Will try to hunt them down with his Thugs.
title: Merchant&amp;amp;nbsp;

name: Larz
summary: Thug in the employ of Thomas Prahmhandler

name: Mho
summary: Thug in the employ of Thomas Prahmhandler

name: Hanna Lastkahn
summary: Betroth to Thomas Prahmhandler, but in love with Friedrich von Pfeifraucher
info: Snuck away to the Three Feathers with Friedrich von Pfeifraucher, and saw him kill Hans Erpresser  to her shock. Then when her husband came as well, she was really freaked out. Still loves Friedrich, but afraid of what Thomas Prahmhandler might do now.

name: Friedrich von Pfeifraucher
summary: Trickster and romantic, that has a taste for women
info:
Latest love object is Hanna Lastkhan, who is betroth to Thomas Prahmhandler, but in love with Friedrich. Friedrich is not in love, but likes the attention. 
Killed Hans Erpresser in panic, which was never discovered and left. Haven't talked with Hanna Lastkhan since then, and thinks is a bit to dangerous now, so will try to leave her
title: Nobel lord

name: Hans Erpresser
summary: Servant of Maria Ulrike Von Liebwitz Of Ambosstein, killed by Friedrich von Pfeifraucher
info: Recognised Friedrich von Pfeifraucher as the Three Feathers, and tried to blackmail him. Was killed by Friedrich von Pfeifraucher for that.

name: Jendrick von Dabernick
summary: General of the Emperial army, current ruler of Ubersreik
info:
Responsible for leading the armies hat sized control of Ubersreik, on the Emperors order. Heavy handed in his pursuit of any one opposing his rule in the town.  
Works with Emanuelle Nacht, but doesn't like her that much. Thinks she interfers to much which his rule

name: Glimbrin Oddsocks
summary: Gnome thief and trickster
info:
Lives on creating chaos. Was the one that stole the dagger from the players that Dominique Herveaux used to kill Bruno Franke, to shift the blame at her. 
But also the one that introduced the players to Gert Hunder, so that they got the job helping Wilmer

name: Ilse Frecht
summary: Leader of the Cult of Ranald in Ubersreik
info: Leader of the Cult of Ranald in Ubersreik
